String.Source:
The Cost of Complacency By Mike Burgess

How strong is your fear of synths? The latest news out of Covenant is a rather worrying reminder of the dangers the Institute presents. It seems as though the caravan lost in proximity to the idyllic town was destroyed by a synth that had previously infiltrated and replaced one of their members. This echo of the Broken Mask incident has shaken the confidence of many -- for how can we know for sure whether or not someone we know has been themselves replaced? One thing is for sure: The people of the Commonwealth need to have a means of identifying synths before they can strike. We can only hope such research is being conducted somewhere, and that it will swiftly bear fruit.
String.Dest:
自满的代价 作者： 麦克·伯吉斯

你有多么恐惧合成人？ 圣约村的最新消息令人担忧学院所带来的危险。似乎事情的原因是因为一个合成人替换了该村的村民，被发现了。接着整个村子就被合成人屠杀了。这个《面馆惨案》的后续动摇了许多人的信心，因为我们如何能够确切地知道我们认识的人是否已经被合成人取代了？ 有一件事是肯定的：联邦的人需要具有识别合人的手段。我们只能希望这样的研究能在某个地方进行，并将迅速见效。

String.Source:
Too Good to be True? By Mike Burgess

East of Lexington, near the center of the Commonwealth, is a small town by the name of Covenant. In recent days it's gained a reputation as idyllic, featuring strong walls, friendly citizens, and the best lemonade you've ever tasted -- or so many caravans have claimed. Something may be amiss, however. Word is a mercenary by the name of Honest Dan has been hired to investigate the destruction of a caravan run by Old Man Stockton; a caravan that was lost almost suspiciously close to Covenant. We'd all like this friendly community to be an example for people from the Glowing Sea to the Slog, so it is with baited breath that we await the results of this investigation.
String.Dest:
过犹不及? 作者： 麦克·伯吉斯

莱克星顿东部，靠近联邦的中心，是由圣约命名的圣约村。最近，这里以坚固的城墙，友好的人民，和最好的柠檬水著称，至少是很多行商如此表示 。 然而，有些事情可能不对头。沃德是代号”诚实的丹“的佣兵，他受雇调查一个属于老人斯托克顿跑商队的毁坏大篷车，一架在非常接近圣约村附近失踪的大篷车。 我们都喜欢来自友善社区的朋友，从发光海到爬泥地，因此，我们迫切地等待调查结果。

String.Source:
The Cost of Security By Mike Burgess

How strong is your fear of synths? We all have heard the stories -- people vanishing, replaced by near identical copies. It's definitely something to be worried about, but is it worth sacrificing countless lives, human lives, to prevent? The investigation of Covenant has drawn to a close, and according to sources that wish to remain anonymous, the town was, in fact, a front for an organization developing a simple test to identify synths. Thought his sounds like a dream come true, the cost of this new weapon in the war against the Institute was the kidnapping, torture, and execution of countless human lives. We have this information only because this operation has been halted. This was, again, at the cost of many human lives. With all this bloodshed, one must ask whether or not the test is truly worth it. Can we justify using a tool that was forged from the blood of the innocent? And if not, can we afford to discard it?
String.Dest:
安全的代价 作者 麦克·伯吉斯

你有多么恐惧合成人？ 我们都听过这样的故事——人们消失了，取而代之的是几乎一模一样的复制品。这是一件值得担心的事，但值得牺牲无数生命、人命来防止吗？ 圣约村的调查已经结束，并根据匿名来源的消息，该镇，事实上是一个组织开发一个简单的测试器来鉴别合成人的实验地点。尽管他的说法听起来极有诱惑力，但这一新武器在对学院的战争所支付的代价是：绑架、折磨和处决无数人的生命。 我们得到这些信息仅仅是因为这个武器的研发被中止了，而这又是以牺牲许多人的生命为代价的。在所有这些流血事件中，人们必须问这次实验是否值得。我们能用一个从无辜者的鲜血中锻造出来的工具来辩护吗？ 如果没有，我们可以放弃吗？

String.Source:
Raider Stronghold Disbanded By Mike Burgess

Anyone who has traveled the area around Diamond City knows the ruins surrounding the Great Green Jewel of the Commonwealth are awash in danger. Every corner, every tunnel, every alley could hide lethal terror. Today, however, we have what might be good news -- Just north of Diamond City, a small raider stronghold known as Hangman's Alley has experienced a change of ownership, and rumor has it that the new occupant may have friendlier plans for the place. Make no mistake, the area around Diamond City is still dangerous, but if this news is any indication, we may soon see a new safe waypoint on the roads.
String.Dest:
匪帮据点解散 作者 麦克伯吉斯

任何游历过钻石城的人都知道，联邦的绿宝石周围的废墟充满了危险。每一个角落，每一个隧道，每一条小巷都能隐藏致命的恐怖。 今天，然而，我们有些好消息，就在钻石城以北，被称为刽子手小径的匪帮要塞经历了所有权的变更，并有传言说新主人可能是位和平爱好者。 毫无疑问，在钻石城的地区仍然是危险的，但如果这消息是真的，我们可以很快看到道路上的一个新的安全点。

String.Source:
Horrors of the Pickman Gallery! By Alex Chang

The grisly truth behind a wasteland legend has finally come to light. People whisper in hushed tones of the elusive Pickman, who some call saint, and others monster. Until now only a strange calling card sometimes found with the bodies of dead raiders, signed with a bloody heart, proved he existed. Mayor Hancock, of Goodneighbor, recently launched an investigation into this Commonwealth boogeyman. A special investigator sent out to what raiders call the "Pickman Gallery", a location long rumored to be the home of this notorious figure, relayed a chilling tale. Within the walls of this crumbling building lie canvasses painted with horrific imagery in human blood and sculptures crafted of flesh and bone, trophies taken from the victims of Pickman, mere legend no more. The mayor's office advises all travelers to give this madman's domain a wide berth.
String.Dest:
恐怖的皮克曼画廊！ 作者 亚历克斯·张

荒地传说背后的恐怖真相终于水落石出。 低声耳语令人难以捉摸的皮克曼，有人叫他圣人，有人叫他怪物。到现在为止，只有在死亡匪帮尸体上的签署了血淋淋的心的名片，证明了他的存在。 芳邻镇长汉考克，最近开始调查这个联邦的恶魔。特别调查员出发前往匪帮称为“皮克曼画廊”的地方，此地在恐怖故事里长期传言是这个臭名昭著的人物的家。传说在这个摇摇欲坠的大楼里墙壁绘有可怕的用人体血液绘制的作品，还有用肉和骨头制作的雕塑。 市长办公室建议所人都和这个疯子的领地保持距离。

String.Source:
Strange Radio Transmission Begs Assistance By A.J. Cleary

A weak radio signal emanating from Cambridge Police Station broadcasts a looping recorded message requesting "support or evac." The recording tells of a group trapped in the station has sustained casualties and is running low on supplies. The female voice identifies itself as scribe Haylen, a member of reconnaissance squad Gladius and provides an authorization code, Arks Ferel 95. There is no explanation of the phrase's meaning. Recent reports indicate the local raider gang may have been the victims of a massive feral ghoul attack. We have no further information regarding the status of squad Gladius.
String.Dest:
奇怪的无线电传输请求援助 作者 A.J.克利

微弱的无线电信号从剑桥派出所发出，消息循环广播,内容是：“请求支持或撤离”。信号声称一群被钢铁兄弟会成员被困在车站，已经伤亡惨重，弹药补给供应不足。 女性的声音自称书记员海伦，隶属于短剑侦察小队，并提供了一个授权码，“Arks Ferel 95”。这个短语的意思没有被解释。 最近的报告表明当地的匪帮团伙可能是一大波的野生食尸鬼袭击的受害者。对于短剑侦查小队的状况我们没有进一步的信息。

String.Source:
Crime for the Centuries! By Alex Chang

An immortal mob boss, a dead cop put into a robot body, and a dangerous drifter who would bring them together for a final showdown after over 200 years. It sounds like something out of the pages of a Hubris Comics adventure, but it's not. It's the unlikely story of Diamond City's only openly synth resident, Nick Valentine. Chasing a series of pre-war holotapes, the private detective and his new partner set to unraveling Nick's toughest case...his own. Or rather, the case of the human Nick Valentine, a pre-war policeman used by the Institute to create the synth P.I. The trail of the human Valentine's old case files led to one Edward L. Winter, a notorious pre-war Mafioso who had himself deliberately ghoulified in order to cheat death. Through the efforts of Nick Valentine and his partner, this dangerous fugitive was at long, long last brought to justice, putting an end to what may well have been the Commonwealth's oldest life of crime.
String.Dest:
世纪之罪! 作者 亚历克斯·张

一个不朽的黑帮老大，一个放进机器人身体的警察。一个危险的陌生人把他们聚在一起，为200年的谜团揭开线索。这听起来像是一部傲慢的漫画冒险小说中的东西，但它不是。这是钻石城唯一公开身份的合成人居民，尼克·瓦伦丁的传奇故事。 追逐的一系列的战前全像卡带，私人侦探和他的新伙伴开始解开尼克最棘手的案子…他自己。或者说，人类的尼克·瓦伦丁的故事。 尼克·瓦伦丁(人类），战前的一名警察，学院吧他的意识放入了一具合成人的躯体。调查人类尼克时，各种线索归集到了爱德华·L·温特身上，一个臭名昭著的战前黑手党成员。爱德华将自己转换为尸鬼，并借此假死。。经过尼克·瓦伦丁和他的伙伴的努力，这个危险的逃犯终于被绳之以法，结束了可能是联邦最古老的罪犯生涯。

String.Source:
An Unlikely Union By Wren Edwards

Can you teach a robot to love? Apparently, if you're Diamond City schoolteacher Mr. Zwicky, you can! After years of service to his community, Mr. Zwicky found love from an unlikely source in the form of his assistant Miss Edna, a General Atomics "Miss Nanny" robot. The happy couple were recently married in a small outdoor ceremony at the All Faiths Chapel, with Pastor Clements presiding. While Mr. Zwicky declined to comment on the origins of his unusual relationship, his wife, Mrs. Edna Zwicky, credited the kind words of a passing stranger with giving her the push she needed to realize and confess her true feelings. I, for one, wish them a happy (and we can only hope injury-free) honeymoon.
String.Dest:
一个不太可能的联盟 作者：雷恩·爱德华兹

你能教会一个机器人去爱吗？显然，如果你是钻石城的教师兹维基先生，你可以！由他的助理埃德娜小姐那里得到的消息：经过多年的服务自己的社区，兹维基先生发现自己爱上了一个出乎意料的对象，一个通用原子公司的“保姆”的机器人”南希小姐“。不久前，这对幸福的夫妇在教堂举行了一个小小的户外结婚仪式。而兹维基先生拒绝评论他的不寻常的关系 和他的妻子：埃德娜·兹维基太太.居心太太是在一个路过的陌生人的说服下明白了自己的内心，接受了先生。而我自己，也祝他们度过一个幸福（希望没有伤害）的蜜月。

String.Source:
A "Handy" Place to Shop? By Wren Edwards

Smart wastelanders have long known to avoid the plaza dominated by an enormous statue of a Mister Handy, marking the site of the old General Atomics Galleria. The high concentration of defective and volatile Handys and Gutsys have made the site simply more trouble than it's worth to scavenge. However, it seems that someone has finally managed to slip past the pre-war security and change all that, and no more does hostile robotic security plague the area. Of course, to the victor go the spoils, but there may still be plenty to find, whether you're in the market to pick up some leftovers from the old world, or just interested in looking around for curiosity's sake. Why not stop in for a look next time you're passing through?
String.Dest:
方便购物的地方? 作者 雷恩·爱德华兹

聪明的废土客向来避免出入广场，那些被巧手先生支配的区域代表着古老的通用原子公司的商业街区。强大的各种战前机器人让这个区域难以拾荒。然而，似乎有人终于突破了战前的安保设置，改变了一切，而且敌对的机器人也变为友好了。当然，胜利者已经搜刮了战利品，但也许还有很多东西可以找到，无论你是在市场上从旧世界捡些残羹剩饭，还是仅仅为了好奇而四处寻找。你下次路过的时候为什么不顺便来看一看呢？

String.Source:
Battle for the Castle! By Wren Edwards

Across the Commonwealth, reports have been coming in of Minutemen traveling from locations as remote as the newly-resettled Sanctuary, heading for the old world fortress known as simply "The Castle". This fortress was once the seat of the Minutemen's power, but lost almost fifty years ago. There, heated battle ensued, not against raiders, but the dangerous wildlife of the wasteland itself. If you have any doubt as to the outcome, you have only to turn on a radio. Broadcast from the heart of the Castle, the soothing tones of those violins serve once again as a song of unity and of freedom, a literal beacon of hope for all those who still dream of a better tomorrow. In a related story, the price of mirelurk meat and eggs saw a brief downturn this week, following a sudden influx in supply amongst Minutemen-allied settlements.
String.Dest:
城堡之战！ 作者 雷恩·爱德华兹

在联邦，据称Minutemen已经从位置偏远的庇护山丘，前往旧世界的堡垒，我们大家都知道的“城堡”：在昆西大屠杀前不久失去了的曾经权力宝座，。激烈的战斗接踵而至，不是针对袭击者，而是废土上的危险野生动物。然而，如果你对结果有任何疑问，你只需要打开收音机。从城堡中心的广播，舒缓的音调，那些小提琴再次歌颂团结和自由，这里就是人类之光，希望灯塔！ 另外，沼泽蟹的肉和蛋价格本周突然暴跌，原因是Minutemen相关聚落大量出售这些食物。

String.Source:
Bloody Standoff in Concord By Alex Chang

Travelers passing through the area near Concord report the sounds of weapons fire coming from the city center for several days. Eyewitnesses tell of a prolonged standoff between raiders and a group of heavily entrenched defenders, led by Minuteman and Quincy survivor Preston Garvey. All of this came to a head with the reactivation of pre-war heavy weapons located on the roof of the Museum of Freedom, apparently left there by a crashed vertibird. The exact details of the event are conflicted, and reports seem almost too fantastical to be believed. However, what is certain is that the corpses of notorious raider Gristle and his men were found lying in the Concord streets, along with the butchered, heavily mangled carcass of one of the wasteland's deadliest predators - the mighty deathclaw - following the incident.
String.Dest:
康科德的血腥对峙 作者 亚历克斯·张

穿越康科德附近地区的旅客报告了从市中心传来的持续几天来武器开火的声音。目击者声称匪帮和一组重装部队进行了持续很久的对峙，重装部队的领导是Minutemen领导者和昆西的幸存者普雷斯顿·加维。这一切都是被一个位于博物馆的屋顶的战前重武器激活。该事件的具体细节有互相矛盾之处，太过玄幻不太可信。不过，可以确定的是，臭名昭著的格里斯特和他手下的尸体被发现躺在康科德街道上，旁边还有一具血肉模糊的巨大尸体，据信是一只 荒地的致命天敌：强大的死亡爪。

String.Source:
Rex Goodman Rescued! By Wren Edwards

Travelers in the downtown Boston area east of Diamond City have probably heard the distress signal coming from high atop Trinity Tower. Rex Goodman, of the Charles River Trio, has been calling for a rescuer after being captured by super mutants. Whether due to the infamy of the Trio's performances or the danger of the task, few have been eager to respond, but at long last it seems Rex's savior has come. Following some heightened activity from within the tower, the distress signal has gone quiet, and witnesses report seeing Rex Goodman on his way back to WRVR. Love them or hate them, it looks like the Trio's radio dramas will soon be back on the air.
String.Dest:
雷克斯·古德曼获救! 作者 雷恩·爱德华兹

在钻石城以东的波士顿市区，游客们可能听到了来自高高的三一塔的求救信号。查尔斯河三人组的雷克斯·古德曼在被超级变种人捕获后一直在呼吁救援人员。不知是由于的三人组的骂名或任务的危险，很少有人回应，但最后似乎雷克斯的救星来了。随着高塔上的一阵战斗，求救信号已经安静，目击者报告说看到雷克斯·古德曼回到WRVR。无论喜欢他们或者讨厌他们，看起来三人的广播剧很快就会重现。

String.Source:
Valentine Delivered by Alyssa Elaine

The people of Diamond City have been concerned for some time as to the whereabouts of Nick Valentine, DC's premium Private Detective. Nick suddenly disappeared while working a case and hasn't been heard from until now. Nick returned to Diamond City with an unnamed companion recently and granted the New Bugle an exclusive interview. "Well, I was looking into Skinny Malone. Supposedly his gang had nabbed a young lady so I went to check it out. Ellie tried to warn me it was all a trap" reports Valentine. "Malone doesn't seem to like me very much, so it turns out it was a trap. His boys overpowered me and locked me up as soon as I got to his hide out. Thought I was done for when a stranger comes in and frees me. We 'talked' our way out and then I came back to DC. I can say one thing for sure though, Malone won't be a problem anymore. As for my guardian angel, I've agreed to help them out with a small situation they're having". The 'how' or 'why' isn't important, what matters is that Diamond City has it's superlative super sleuth back where he belongs with one less mob boss to worry about.
String.Dest:
侦探瓦伦丁回归 作者： 艾丽莎·伊莲

钻石城的人们对尼克·瓦伦丁私人侦探的行踪感到担忧。尼克在工作时突然失踪，直到现在还没有人见到。尼克最近和一位未具姓名的同伴回到钻石城，并接受了新号角报的独家专访。 “嗯，我在调查 斯金尼·马隆。据说他的帮派抓获一个年轻的女士，所以我去看了一下。艾莉试图警告我这一切都是陷阱。”瓦伦丁说道“马隆似乎不太喜欢我，结果证明那是个圈套。我刚到他的藏身处，他的孩子们就制服了我，把我锁起来。当一个陌生人走进来释放我时，我以为我已经完了。我们聊了几句之后一同出去，然后回到了钻石城。我可以肯定地说一件事，马隆不再是个问题了。至于我的守护天使，我同意帮助他们走出小小的困境。” “如何”或“为什么”并不重要，重要的是，钻石城最高级的超级侦探回到属于他的地方，并且市民少了一个黑帮老大需要担心。

String.Source:
Current Events By Wren Edwards

Today, traders report new stores of Nuka Cola have been uncovered. This will surely come as a relief to many. Although in recent years, whether due to the aging of ingredients or a general increase in the hardiness of we wasteland survivors, cases of Nuka addiction are almost unheard of, they are not unknown. Nor do many of us forget the troubles of yesteryear, when this beloved beverage was better known for its more sinister side. Regardless, new sources of Nuka Cola means new sources of caps, important as those long in circulation begin to wear. However, this reporter would caution that an influx in new caps may also present a tempting opportunity for counterfeiters to try to slip some home-minted blanks in with the bunch. Merchants and traders should be especially vigilant in weeks to come.
String.Dest:
时事 作者： 雷恩·爱德华兹

今天，交易员报告核子可乐新商店被发现。这肯定会使许多人感到宽慰。虽然近年来，无论是由于成分失效或因为废土客毒抗增强，对核子可乐成瘾的案例几乎是闻所未闻，然而也不是完全没有。我们中的许多人还忘记不了过去的烦恼，当这种饮料有名的更险恶的一面。 不管怎样，新的核子可乐来源意味着新瓶盖的来源，重要的那些旧瓶盖在交易中开始磨坏了。然而，记者注意到在新瓶盖的涌入中也可能存在造假者尝试偷鸡摸狗，混入一些假造的瓶盖。商人和贸易商在未来几周内应该格外警惕。

String.Source:
<font size='18'>Stashing an extra copy of the City software and the leftover ASAM sensors down here... just in case. If shit gets that bad out there, we may need this so we can start rebuilding with minimal staff.
-Jan </font>
String.Dest: <font size='18'>收藏一份城市管理软件的备份，还有剩下的ASAM传感器…以防万一。如果这玩意真坏了，我们可能需要它们，以便可以开始以最少的工作人员来重建。 -詹 <字体>

String.Source:
Airship Darkens Commonwealth Skies By A.J. Cleary

A gigantic airship appeared over the Commonwealth from the south, escorted by several operational vertibirds. The ship announced itself with the following message, broadcast from speakers on the ship; "People of the Commonwealth, do not interfere. Our intentions are peaceful. We are the Brotherhood of Steel." The airship appears similar to a prewar zeppelin, though observers claim it was likely built recently. It shows no signs of two centuries of decay as a restored model would, and few of the design elements match images found in the Boston Public Library ruins. The airship stopped over Boston Airport, where the Brotherhood of Steel (BoS) has constructed facilities and defenses, though their purpose remains unknown. Since its arrival, BoS has made no further attempts to communicate. Though no incidents have been reported, citizens are advised to avoid interfering with BoS patrols. Squads can be seen airborne or on foot, and are heavily armed and armored. BoS operators often skirmish with Gunners and Raiders, but have shown no aggression toward citizens.
String.Dest:
遮天蔽日的飞艇覆盖联邦的天空 作者：A.J.克利

一个巨大的飞艇出现在联邦的南部，由几个飞鸟直升机护卫。该船发布了以下消息，船上的发言人广播；“联邦人民，不要干涉我们的行动。我们的意图是和平的。我们是钢铁兄弟会。” 飞艇类似战前的飞艇，但观察家称，很可能是最近建成的。它没有一个修复飞艇该有的衰落痕迹，有不少设计元素匹配波士顿公共图书馆废墟中发现的战前飞艇图像。 飞艇在波士顿机场停了下来，在那里建造了设施和防御工事，尽管他们的目的仍然不明。自从它来到，钢铁兄弟会就没有进一步的沟通尝试了。 虽然没有发生任何事件，但市民应避免干预钢铁兄弟会巡逻。他们的巡逻小队可以空降或步行，全副武装和装甲。钢铁兄弟会巡逻小队经常与枪手和废土者发生冲突，但对公民没有攻击性。

String.Source: Design: Note: Level: Power: Defense: Food: Water: Happiness: Income/Tax:
String.Dest: 设计: 说明: 等级: 电力: 防御: 食物: 饮水: 幸福度: 收入/税收:

String.Source:
<font size='18'>I said a few sensors, not two boxes of the damn things. We're just building a couple houses, not a fuckin city. Send these things back! And the tape too - we don't need it - but we do need our money back.
Make it happen!
-Paulie </font>
String.Dest: <font size='18'>我说了只要几个传感器，不是他妈的满满两盒该死的。我们只是在建几栋房子，而不是建他妈的一座城市。把这些东西送回去！和磁带一起！-我们不需要这玩意-但我们确实需要把我们的钱拿回来。 使它发生！ -保利 <font>

String.Source: Design: Power: Defense: Food: Water: Happiness Bonus: Scavenge Bonus: Income: Tax Rate:
String.Dest: 设计: 能源: Defense: 食物: Water: 幸福加成: 拾荒加成: 收入: Tax Rate:

String.Source:
<font size='18'>I'm telling you - the statue is important!
- MacCready </font>
String.Dest:
<font size='18'>我要告诉你 - 雕像非常重要!
- 麦克·克雷迪 </font>

String.Source:
Railroad Headquarters Discovered, Destroyed By A.J. Cleary

A bloody firefight broke out at the Old North Church as a Brotherhood of Steel squad wiped out the Railroad leadership. While no reports have surfaced as to how the Brotherhood learned of the Railroad's base of operations, it's clear it was not a chance encounter. The Brotherhood appears to have been seeking the utter destruction of the Railroad, obliterating the Railroad command structure in a swift, merciless attack on the already ruined church. This follows of several aggressive actions by the Brotherhood. As the organization continues to expand its presence, we advise citizens to look to their own security. The Minutemen continue to grow, and they may be the best hope for the Commonwealth.
String.Dest:
铁路组织总部被发现已被摧毁 By A.J. Cleary

一场血腥的枪战爆发在旧北教堂爆发，钢铁兄弟会小队消灭了铁路组织的领导者。虽然还没有关于兄弟会如何了解铁路组织基地的报道，但很明显这并不是一次偶然的相遇。 大屠杀结束后，自由之路末端被毁的教堂在大屠杀中被拆毁，整个铁路组织的指挥结构被一次又一次的无情的袭击摧毁了。看来兄弟会试图彻底摧毁铁路组织。 这次行动是 最近通过普利斯温号飞艇抵达联邦的钢铁兄弟会，进行了一系列令人担忧的行动之后，最严重的一次。随着该组织逐步加强其侵略性，建议公民加强自身安全。Minutemen正在继续显示他们的存在，在这一点上，他们可能是联邦最后的希望。

String.Source:
Current Events By Wren Edwards

Urban development continues across the Commonwealth as new resources are brought in daily, thanks in no small part to the recovery of pre-war city planning tools. Give thanks to your local home and business owners, friends. Their hard work and tax metal is what allows us to enjoy the safety and progress we have become accustomed to. Civilization rides on the backs of responsible citizens. If you're looking to buy some property, whether it be to start a new venture or just for a little place to call your own, it's always a great time to do so. Keep an eye out for any plots that go up for sale in your area and stake your claim right away. A better tomorrow depends on every one of us.
String.Dest:
时事 作者 雷恩·爱德华兹

随着每天都有新资源的出现，整个联邦城市的发展仍在继续，这在很大程度上要归功于战前城市规划工具的恢复。感谢当地的家庭和企业主，朋友们。他们的辛勤工作和税收是让我们享受安全和进步的基础。文明建造于负责任的公民的背上。如果你想买一些房地产，不管是创业还是仅仅找个小地方，你都可以这么做。留意你所在地区出售的任何地块，并立即提出申请。美好的明天取决于我们每一个人。

String.Source:
Current Events By Wren Edwards

Recently, we've seen a rise in feral ghoul activity, following harsh radstorms. Fortunately, long term damage to crops has been minimal, and things seem to be calming down. Nevertheless, you should pack extra Rad-X and Rad Away while traveling between settlements for a while. As always, keep an eye out for places to take shelter, should a radstorm roll in. Most importantly, stay vigilant while traveling near ruins, as ferals possess far greater strength and agility than their frail-looking bodies would suggest. That said, get in your molerat hunting early, as all signs point to good weather for a barbecue later in the week.
String.Dest:
时事 作者 雷恩·爱德华兹

最近，我们已经看到了在野生食尸鬼活动上升，恶劣的辐射风暴是其原因。幸运的是，对农作物的长期破坏是微乎其微的，而且事情似乎正在平静下来。然而，你应把额外的福特宁和抗辐宁存在去旅行时用。一如既往，留意辐射风暴。最重要的是，前往附近的废墟而保持警惕，因为最近变异生物拥有比他们虚弱的身体看起来更大的力量和敏捷。 就是说，让你的狩猎鼹鼠的日子提前，有迹象表明本周晚些时候会有一个适合烧烤的好天气。

String.Source:
Current Events By Wren Edwards

Bad news for collectors, today. According to inside sources, a rare edition of the magazine "La Coiffe" was recently sold at private auction in the Diamond City upper stands. While the buyer has not been disclosed, leaked information reveals that the final bids were in excess of 250,000 caps. The fashion magazine has long proven a difficult one for enthusiasts to complete their collections of. Due to a low pre-war printing that primarily saw distribution to salons and hairdressers, locating surviving copies of many issues is difficult, and this high price tag on the rarer ones won't be making that any easier.
String.Dest:
时事 作者： 雷恩·爱德华兹

对收藏家来说，今天是个坏消息。据内部消息，一本稀有的“头饰”杂志，最近在位于钻石城上城区的私人拍卖所被拍卖了。虽然买方尚未透露，泄露的信息显示，最终出价超过250000瓶盖上限。时尚杂志长期以来被证明是一个很难收集全的收藏品类。由于低战前印刷量，主要分布于沙龙和美发店、定位具有收藏价值的杂志是很困难的，这种罕见的高价格也不会使收藏变得容易。

String.Source:
Finally Out in the Open by Alyssa Elaine

Citizens of the Commonwealth that listen to Diamond City Radio may have been hearing a strange message lately. Some of the message seems reassuring while other parts seem less so, but one fact is certain... The Institute is Real and has finally revealed itself to the world with an announcement that has been playing on a loop. While no one is sure what to make of this revelation, there has been a mixed reaction from the public. Some citizens believe they are here to help humanity, with mankind's best interests in mind. These people think we should stay out of the way. Let them do what they need to with this "reactor" that is going online. Others are not so optimistic. There are some that believe the Institute has revealed itself for the sole purpose of killing everyone and taking over the world. They believe that we should all unite and strike at the Institute now that they are out in the open. That this "reactor" is really a new super weapon. However super weapon rumors are nothing new. The current one going around is that the Brotherhood of Steel have a giant robot. Neither rumor has been confirmed.
String.Dest:
终于公开了 作者： 艾丽莎·伊莲

联邦的市民听钻石城广播电台最近可能听到一个奇怪的信息。有些信息似乎让人放心，而其他部分似乎不那么可靠，但有一点是肯定的…学院是真实的，并终于向世界发布了一个公告，公告一直在循环播放。 虽然没有人知道为什么学院会揭露这一的真相，但公众却有各种各样的反应。一些公民相信他们是来帮助人类的，把人类的最大利益放在心上。这些人认为我们应该置身事外。让他们把这个“反应堆”开起来。其他人则不那么乐观。有些人认为学院揭露了自己的唯一目的，就是要杀死所有人并征服整个世界。他们认为我们应该团结起来，向学院发起攻击，因为他们现在已经公开了。并声称这个“反应堆”真的是一种新的超级武器。然而超级武器的谣言并不是什么新鲜事。目前的另一个谣言是，钢铁兄弟会有一个巨大的机器人。两个谣言都没有得到证实。

String.Source:
Massacre at Old North Church by Alyssa Elaine

Investigators made a gruesome discovery at the Old North Church in North End after a passing caravan reported sounds of a fire fight from inside. "It were my job to keep watch," said the caravan guard, "when the shootin and hollerin from the old church woke me up. Thought it were a deathclaw or some greenskins so I crawled under the wagon for a better look. I got real quiet but I didn't see nobody". For those that don't know, Old North Church was where Robert Newman, on the orders of Paul Revere, hung 2 lanterns in the steeple to warn patriots of the coming redcoats in 1775. Upon entering the church basement, authorities found a scene of utter devastation. Numerous bodies were scattered among the crypts below the church. A search of the area uncovered evidence that the catacombs were headquarters for the RailRoad, and the victims its leaders. The Institute's hatred for the RailRoad makes them the primary suspect. However, they tend to act from the shadows and in secret indicating this awful crime may have been carried out by someone else entirely. Perhaps the very synths they "rescued" turned on them. We may never know.
String.Dest:
旧北教堂大屠杀 作者 艾丽莎·伊莲

调查人员在旧北教堂有了可怕的发现，一辆路过的商队报告了从里面传来的火灾声。“观察是我的工作，“商队的警卫说，“当从老教堂的枪声和呼喊把我叫醒。我认为这是一个死亡爪或变种人的攻击，所以我爬到车下找到一个更好的观察点。我很安静，但没看见任何人。对于那些不知道的，旧北教堂是1775年 洛纽文在保罗·里维尔的命令，挂起两个红灯笼在尖塔警告爱国者即将到来的英国士兵的地方。 当进入教堂地下室时，当局发现了一片满目疮痍的景象。无数的尸体散落在教堂中的地洞里。搜索区域发现的墓穴是铁路组织的总部。学院对铁路组织的憎恨使他们成为主要嫌疑犯。然而，他们往往从阴影中行动，可能这一可怕的罪行可能是由其他人完全执行的。也许他们”拯救“的合成人就是凶手。但我们也许永远不会知道真相。

String.Source:
General Fends off Institute Onslaught By A.J. Cleary

Facing a swarm of Institute synths, the Minutemen rallied behind their General and triumphed against overwhelming odds. While many Minutemen fell, the Institute failed to tighten their grasp on the region by taking the Castle; de facto capital of the Commonwealth. The fierce fighting began when a contingent of Synth patrollers assaulted the Castle from Southie. while the defenders dispatched the first wave with little trouble, still more came, each successive wave of synths bringing more advanced models. The Minutemen proved stout defenders behind their new general, and many gave their lives in defense of the Commonwealth. They held the Castle and left scattered piles of twitching, sparking ruin where the Synth had stood. This battle dispels any remaining doubts about the Minutemen's fitness to defend the Commonwealth. Outnumbered and out-gunned, the Minutemen responded to the leadership of the General and Preston Garvey, rallied to their symbolic home, and fought like demons possessed in defense of the Commonwealth, in defense of us. We owe now a great debt.
String.Dest:
Minutemen将军击败了学院的进攻 作者 A.J.克利

面对一群学院合成人，Minutemen在他们的将军领导下赢得了压倒性胜利。虽然许多Minutemen战死，学院图谋占领城堡以谋求更大资源的阴谋被挫败了。 激烈的战斗开始时，一支合成人小队从南边出发攻击城堡。而守军派轻易击溃了他们。之后，更高级的合成人陆续出现，组成了好几个攻击波次。 Minutemen证明了自己捍卫联邦安全的勇气和决心。他们在普雷斯顿·加维的领导下，以少胜多，以若克强，赢得了对学院战斗的胜利；并再一次保卫了联邦的和平与安全。所有联邦的居民，现在都欠他们一个大人情。

String.Source:
Brotherhood Crushed, Minutemen Stand Proud By A.J. Cleary

The Brotherhood of Steel and their super-weapon, the Prydwen, lie ruined after a bold strike by the our greatest defenders, the Minutemen. Artillery strikes from a reported five locations brought down the imposing airship, prompting a swift counterattack on the Castle. The Commonwealth's finest made a heroic stand on the ramparts of the fortress and broke the back of the invader. The General led the defense after ordering the artillery strike. Though many fell, the heart and leadership of the Minutemen held them firm until they could see off the fascistic Brotherhood of Steel, once again proving the Minutemen our greatest hope. We of the Commonwealth continue to owe a great debt of gratitude to our self-sacrificing best-and-brightest. The Minutemen overcame their technological disadvantage through audacity and bravery, and once again prove a shining example of what a people unified by liberty can accomplish.
String.Dest:
兄弟会被击溃，Minutemen再次胜利 作者 A.J.克利

钢铁兄弟会和他们的超级武器，普利斯温号飞艇，在Minutemen的伟大进攻下，被击毁了！据报道，五个地点的火炮袭击击落了这艘气势宏伟的飞艇，并迅速引起了对城堡的反击。Minutemen军在要塞的城墙进行了英勇抵抗，并击破了侵略者的军队。 将军在下令炮击后亲自指挥了国防军。虽然有许多伤亡，但是将军和Minutemen核心坚持作战，成功击退了来袭的兄弟会，再次证明了联邦最大的希望，就是Minutemen。 我们的联邦继续感激我们自我牺牲的最优秀和最聪明的Minutemen。他们克服了技术劣势通过大胆和勇敢，再一次证明一个事实，联邦的未来，是人的自由和实现统一。

String.Source:
Fire in the Sky By Alex Chang

Commonwealth citizens were recently shocked when the enormous flying ship that so recently brought the Brotherhood of Steel to Boston suddenly erupted into flames. Witnesses report seeing a series of explosions rip through the upper parts of the airship, culminating in one or more massive blasts which seemed to engulf the entirety of the vessel. Logan Cutter, a caravaneer out of Bunker Hill, was one such witness. He reports: "One minute, she was just floating there. The next? The whole damn thing lights up hotter than a pack of pyro raiders. I don't think anyone could have survived that...poor bastards." Indeed, the chances of survival for the Brotherhood members aboard the airship seem slim. Following the explosions, the vessel was seen to fall from the sky, crashing into Boston Airport, where it had been moored. As with most things regarding the Brotherhood, details are scarce, and it remains unknown whether the cause of the explosions was accident, sabotage, or attack. As yet, scavvers have been unwilling to brave the wreckage, fearing retaliation from Brotherhood survivors.
String.Dest:
天空中的火 作者 亚历克斯·张

联邦公民最近感到震惊的是，最近把钢铁运到波士顿的那艘巨大的飞行船突然起火了。目击者报告说，在飞艇的上部发生了一连串的爆炸，最终发生了一次或多次大规模爆炸，似乎吞没了整个飞船。 洛根·卡特，一个邦克山出身的商人，是一个目击者。他报告说：“一分钟，她只是漂浮在那里。下一分钟？整个该死的东西比太阳还亮。我认为没有人能幸存下来……可怜的混蛋。” 事实上，飞艇上兄弟会成员的生存机会似乎渺茫。爆炸发生后，飞船被发现从空中坠落，坠毁在波士顿机场。如同大多数关于兄弟会的事情一样，细节还很稀少，爆炸的原因是意外、破坏还是攻击还不得而知。然而，拾荒者一直不愿意前去检查残骸，因为担心兄弟会的幸存者的报复。

String.Source:
Walking Death Towers Over Hub By A.J. Cleary

The Brotherhood of Steel have unleased monstrous machine of incalculable capacity for destruction upon the Commonwealth. Escorted by the Brotherhood, the 40 foot bipedal robot stomped his way through Boston, causing carnage every step of the way. It calls itself Liberty Prime. After crossing the Charles River, the beast joined a battle raging between the Brotherhood of Steel and what witnesses report appeared to be Institute Synths. It then cut a deep hole in the Earth, through which several Brotherhood soldiers scrambled. There have been no reported sightings of Liberty Prime since the assault. Such firepower is an existential threat to the Commonwealth, and the Brotherhood of Steel has proven a dangerous and frightening enemy. Should they turn their wrath upon the citizens of the Commonwealth, I fear the liberty this region has stood for the past 514 years shall wither and die.
String.Dest:
行尸走肉逼近城区 作者 A.J.克利

钢铁兄弟会已经释放了巨大的战争机器，拥有无法估量的破坏能。兄弟会护卫着他们的40英尺的双足机器人通过踩踏的方式通过波士顿，每一步都造成大屠杀。 过了查尔斯河，战争机器加入一场战斗钢铁兄弟会和学院合成人的战斗。然后，它在地球切了一个深洞，许多兄弟士兵在那里爬了起来。这只自称为自由女神的怪兽回到了波士顿机场，此后再也没人见到过它。 这种火力是对联邦存在的威胁，钢铁兄弟会已经被证明是一个危险和可怕的敌人。如果他们的愤怒临到我们的公民身上，我担心这个地区过去514年的自由将会枯萎和死亡。

String.Source:
Battle for the Bunker By Alyssa Elaine

The small town of Bunker Hill was the scene of a devastating fire fight recently. Among the combatants were unconfirmed sightings of the BoS, Minutemen, Railroad agents and even sightings of Synths. For now the cause is yet unknown. Dawn Yates had this to say; "Me and my man Brian was walking my dog, Chipper Bones, when all hell broke out. People in big armor was fighting those robot men and bullets and lasers was flyin ever where. I pick up my dog and run for cover". Brian Yates claims; "My wife an her dog was goin for cover so I stay back to help. Them walkin toasters ain't comin in my hood an take over. I kilt 20 of them chrome domes with my bare hands". Witnesses report that multiple assailants began shooting at one another suddenly outside the gate of Bunker Hill. It appears they were only interested in each other because after a while everyone just left. No one knows why they were there or why they chose Bunker Hill. "It was chaos. Folks was runnin an fightin and yelling" reports one witness. "I even seen one lady run by carryin a little dog with some old dude chasing her screamin like a girl hollerin 'wait fer me'. It was crazy".
String.Dest:
为邦克山而战斗 作者 艾丽莎·伊莲

邦克山的小城镇最近发生了一场毁灭性的火灾。在战士们未经证实的目击兄弟会、Minutemen、铁路代理商甚至目击合成人。目前，原因还不明了。 黎明·耶茨曾经这样说；“我和我的男人布瑞恩正在遛狗：削片机，然后突然他妈的就开始了。穿着动力甲的人猛揍合成人，子弹和激光到处乱飞。我抱起我的狗跑去避难”。布瑞恩·耶茨说；“我的妻子和她的狗跑去躲起来了，我就留在后面帮助。这帮铁皮垃圾根本不往我家走，我tm上去空手就干掉了20个，哈啊哈哈！”。 目击者说，袭击者在邦克山的大门外面突然开始相互射击。看来他们只对彼此感兴趣，因为过了一会儿大家都离开了。没有人知道他们为什么在那里，或者他们为什么选择邦克山。 “这是一场乱斗。到处都是人乱喊乱叫“一个目击者说。”我甚至见过一个女人抱着小狗在前面，后面一个老家伙追她叫得像个娘们一样”等等我！“的。真是太疯狂了。

String.Source:
Brotherhood Gone?? by Alyssa Elaine

Boston will never forget when the Brotherhood of Steel made a grand entrance into the Commonwealth. Citizens were asking why they were here or what they wanted. Anyone that knew wasn't talking. Since then, their giant airship could be seen floating above the airport from anywhere in Boston with more than a few residents living in fear of what they might be planning. Fortunately for them, recent events make it irrelevant. Residents and caravans in the area claim to have heard the sounds of war coming from the airport. According to a Nordhagen resident "It was real loud. And I swear I seen a bunch of them synths running around fighting the BoS guys". It was shortly after the war started that citizens in the area were thrown into darkness when massive amounts of smoke filled the skies. "The BoS guys was shooting at the synths, and the tin cans was shooting back at the BoS" says a caravan leader. "I was hoping they'd all kill each other and be done with it. Then that big flying boat they got just blew up. Fell straight down out the sky on fire. And the smoke, it blocked out the sun making it dark like night time". If we're lucky it squished 'em all".
String.Dest:
兄弟会走了?? 作者 艾丽莎·伊莲

波士顿永远不会忘记钢铁兄弟会进入联邦的进场仪式。市民们问他们为什么在这里或他们想要什么。认识的人都不说话。从那时起，他们的巨型飞艇就可以从波士顿的任何地方飞过，最终漂浮在机场上空，有很多居民担心他们可能在计划什么阴谋。幸运的是，最近的事件使它变得无关紧要。 在该地区的居民和商队声称听到了战争的声音来自于机场。根据附近居民的消息：”声音真的很大！我发誓我看到了一堆合成人四处和兄弟会战斗”。 战争爆发后不久，当大量的烟雾弥漫在天空中时，该地区的居民陷入了黑暗之中。“兄弟会的家伙射中了合成人，然后合成人又对着兄弟会猛攻”一个商队队长说。”我希望他们都杀了对方，然后就结束了。然后他们乘坐的那艘大飞机就爆炸了。直接从天空中坠落。还有烟，它挡住了阳光，使它像黑夜一样黑暗。“如果我们幸运的话，他们所有人都被干掉就最好了。

String.Source:
Citizens Fear Chinese Attack! by Allyssa Elaine

Residents living near the Minutemen fort known as the Castle were thrown into a panic when loud noises were followed by large bombs literally falling from the sky. Citizens of the area thought that Red China was attacking again after 200 years. Local shop owners report rioting and even some looting. Shortly afterward, a small group of Minutemen led by Ronnie Shaw responded to calm the situation. Mrs. Shaw agreed to a brief interview. "We found some schematics for artillery in the old armory of the Castle. Our General approved the building of one and what these fools out here heard was us test firing the old gal" says Shaw. "And they better get used to it. Now that we know how to build them, the General can order them built at every settlement in the Commonwealth. We're risking our necks to protect these whiny little pansies, so they best just get out of the way and let us do our job. If our job means artillery bombs flying through the air over their heads then they just need to shut up and deal with it".
String.Dest:
市民害怕中国人袭击! 作者 阿莉莎·伊莲

Minutemen城堡附近的居民声称由于来自天空的巨大声响和随后的巨大爆炸而陷入恐慌。该地区的居民认为这是红色中国200年后的再次攻击。当地店主举报骚乱甚至抢劫事件。不久之后，一群民兵由罗尼·肖带领出面平息了不安。 肖夫人同意接受一个简短的采访。我们在城堡的旧军械库里找到了一些大炮的示意图。肖说：“我们的将军批准了建造一个，而这些傻瓜在这里听到的是我们测试射击的声音。”他们最好习惯它。既然我们知道如何建造它们，将军就可以下令在联邦的每一个定居点建造它们。我们冒着掉脑袋保护这些爱发牢骚的弱鸡，所以他们最好还是让开，让我们做我们的工作。如果我们的工作意味着他们头顶上飞过的大炮炸弹，那么他们只需要闭嘴并接受它。

String.Source:
They Said it Couldn't be Done. by Alyssa Elaine

Sources near the edge of the Glowing Sea have confirmed reports of people going into, and safely leaving, the Sea. Something that was thought impossible. The glowing sea is a desolate wasteland filled with mythic deathclaws, radscorpions and enough radiation to keep even the ghouls away. There are unconfirmed rumors of people living there, but only one person is known to have ever returned safely from going into the Sea, a raider named Bucky. If the old radio tower close to the sunken church is activated, you can hear his friends message for help. Lost out there with an entire set of power armor beside his corpse to this day. Why would anyone want to venture into that barren wasteland? Well, Pre-war records indicate that there's a secret government bunker under a shack with who knows what treasures. Records also tell us that Skylanes flight 1665 that went down when the bombs hit was used for smuggling. Wreckage that sits there with unimaginable goods hidden in the cargo hold, waiting to be discovered. Also, the Sea is home to Sentinel Site, which pre-war records tell us is a storage facility for military goods and Mk 28 warheads.
String.Dest:
他们说这事办不成. 作者 艾丽莎·伊莲

靠近发光海边缘的信息证实了人们进入发光海并安全离开的报道。被认为是不可能的事。发光海是一片荒芜的土地，充满了神秘的死亡爪，辐射蝎和足够的辐射，甚至食尸鬼都不敢靠近。有未经证实的谣言生成有人生活在那里，但只有一个人知道曾经安全地进入并返回，一个匪帮成员名叫巴基。如果靠近下沉教堂的旧广播塔被激活，你可以听到他的朋友求救的信息。在他的尸体旁边丢了一整套盔甲，直到今天。 为什么有人想冒险进入那贫瘠的荒地？战前的记录表明棚屋下面有一个秘密的政府掩体，谁知道有什么宝藏？。记录也告诉我们，天空航空1665次航班在核弹爆炸时坠毁。隐藏在货舱里的货物丰富的难以想象，等待被发现。此外，发光海是哨兵站点的所在地，战前记录告诉我们，这是军用物资和MK 28核弹头的储存设施。

String.Source:
Nuclear Explosion Rocks Commonwealth By A.J. Cleary

A massive explosion, centered on the CIT grounds, sent shock waves throughout the Commonwealth, with citizens from Sanctuary to Salem feeling the effects. The resulting dust cloud covered most of The Hub and surrounding region. "A cloud just suddenly appeared, and everything shook," explained Diamond City resident Martha Bradbury, "It was pitch black and smelled like burning." A crater lake now stands where the Commonwealth Technological Institute once did. Extreme radiation levels have thwarted attempts to explore it and determine where the water is coming from. Most believe the water is flowing in from the Charles River. Initial casualty estimates vary as the number of nearby camps and hideouts is difficult to estimate. Though no individuals or groups have yet claimed responsibility for the blast. Keep your eyes on the New Bugle for updates as they arise.
String.Dest:
核爆炸震动整个联邦 作者 A.J.克利

一个巨大的爆炸，以学院为中心，震撼了整个联邦！从庇护山丘到的塞勒姆的居民都感觉到了影响。由此产生的尘埃云覆盖了大部分的城区和周围区域。 “一片云突然出现，一切都摇晃了，”钻石城居民玛莎布拉·德伯里解释说，“它漆黑一片，散发着燃烧的气味。” 联邦技术研究所，一个著名的战前大学专注于科学和技术，已经被一个巨大的火山口代替，附近的查尔斯河水灌入火山口。最初探索爆炸地区的人遭到了极高辐射水平的阻碍。 初始人员伤亡估计大相径庭，因为附近的营地和藏身之所的数量难以估计。 尽管目前还没有个人或团体声称对爆炸负责。请留意新号角的更新。

String.Source:
Attitudes Toward Brotherhood Mixed; Excitement, Apprehension By A.J. Cleary

The newly arrived Brotherhood of Steel has no plans to remain idle. Following an airborne attack on Fort Hood's Super Mutant occupiers, citizens of the Commonwealth find themselves divided on whether the Brotherhood is a hindrance or a help. "Fewer Super Mutants, like, how's that not good?" asks Commonwealth resident Willie Flaherty, "They ain't hurt me, but they hurting thems that want to hurt me." Helen Murphy agrees, "I got kids. You gotta be barnie if you don't want the Brotherhood putting down those green chowderheads." Others aren't so sure. About 2 in 5 adults we asked expressed unease with the newcomers. "I don't understand why we don't talk to the mutants," said Lewis Foley, "why does everything have to end in killing?" Foley was later found dead, having been shot trying to offer a cake to a Raider camp.
String.Dest:
对兄弟的态度混杂兴奋和忧虑 作者：A.J.克利

新来的钢铁兄弟会显然没有继续闲置的计划。在对胡德堡超级突变占领者进行空中攻击之后，联邦的公民们发现他们对兄弟会是一个障碍还是一个帮助感到困惑。 “少一些超级变种人，比如，那怎么不好？”联邦的居民威利`弗莱厄蒂问，“他们不会伤害我，但他们会杀掉那些想要伤害我的家伙。” 海伦·墨菲同意，“我有孩子。你一定是巴尼如果你不想把那些绿皮怪物干掉。” 其他人则不那么肯定。我们询问了5个成年人中约有2人对新来者表示不安。 “我不明白为什么我们不跟变种人说话，”刘易斯·佛雷说，“为什么一切都要以杀人结束呢？”佛雷后来被发现死了，被枪杀，试图向变种人突击营提供一块蛋糕。

String.Source:
Synth Infestation Cleared from ArcJet Systems Building By AJ Cleary

Witnesses reported gunfire emanating from the ArkJet Systems building. Later investigation revealed a trail of destroyed synths. The synths were using the abandoned prewar building as a base of operations at the time of the infiltration by at least two people. "I seen (sic) two go in," said local vagrant Ian Holmes, who'd been sleeping in one of the prewar vehicles nearby, "Maybe three. Power armor... they was armed (sic) to the teeth." The building had been poor repair even for a prewar building, and the extensive combat inside the facility was hard to separate from the preexisting damage. The dozens of synth 'dead' littering the building attested to the extent of the battle. "I think we're headed for war, if you ask me," Continued Holmes. "You wander the commonwealth as much as I have, there's something big coming."
String.Dest:
电弧发生系统大楼的合成人入侵被击退 作者： A·J·克利

目击者称声音来自发电弧发生系统大楼，包括枪声和爆炸声。后来的调查显示，路上到处都是破坏的合成人零件。合成人是利用废弃的战前楼作为基地进攻的，人数至少两人。 “我看到两个人进去了”当地的流浪汉伊恩·福尔摩斯说，伊恩一直睡在一辆附近的战前车辆边，“也许三个。穿着动力装甲…他们全副武装。“ 建筑是一个非常老旧的建筑，里面的设施的很难判断是新伤还是旧伤。然而，合成人死的到处都是的垃圾证明了战斗的规模 “如果你问我，我想我们要开战了，”福尔摩斯继续说。你像我一样到处游荡，总会有大事发生的。”

String.Source:
New Safe Haven? By Skye Summers

Rumors of a new settlement called Sanctuary have been rapidly spreading throughout the Commonwealth. These rumors claim the settlement has the potential to become a great safe haven that may even rival Diamond City. Of course, resources were sent to check the accuracy of these rumors. It has been concluded that a settlement called Sanctuary does in fact exist, but so far it is far from being complete and only provides the bare necessities for the few settlers living there. But the question does remain - Can Sanctuary become a true safe haven like the rumors suggest?
String.Dest:
新的避风港? 作者： 斯凯·夏日

一个叫做庇护山丘的新定居点的谣言迅速传遍整个联邦。这些谣言声称，该定居点可能成为一个巨大的避风港，甚至可能与钻石城相媲美。当然，特工被派往那里来检查这些谣言的准确性。已经得出结论说，事实上存在一个被称为“庇护山丘”的定居点，但到目前为止还远未完成，只为居住在那里的少数定居者提供了必需品。 但问题依然存在——庇护山丘能否像谣言所说的那样成为真正的避风港？

String.Source:
Welcome to Sanctuary By Skye Summers

After previously investigating the new settlement called Sanctuary, resources were once again sent to check on the progress of the so called "safe haven". Surprisingly the settlement is showing great potential and has appeared to become a true "sanctuary" for the settlers that dwell there. The residents claim that one of their own had a vision of Sanctuary which is why they set out to find it with the help of one of the last remaining Minutemen. A man named Preston. Preston claims the settlers and himself would have never made it without the help of and unnamed hero. who has a strange past. No further comments were made. Stay tuned for exclusive interviews with the Settlers of Sanctuary!
String.Dest:
欢迎来到庇护山丘 作者： 斯凯·夏日

在调查了被称为“庇护山丘”的新定居点之后，人力资源再次被派去检查所谓的"安全天堂"的进展情况。 令人惊讶的是该定居点显示出巨大的潜力，已经成为一个真正的“庇护山丘”。当地居民声称自己追随一个先知的指示，在一个名叫 普雷斯顿 的人的帮助下，来到了庇护山丘。据信普雷斯顿是最后一个活着的Minutemen（分钟人）。 普雷斯顿声称定居者和他自己如果没有一个无名英雄的帮助，是不会成功的。据说无名英雄有着奇怪的过去，关于这一点没有进一步的信息。 敬请期待与庇护山丘居民的独家采访！

String.Source:
Healer Takes a Life. by Alyssa Elaine

Tired of the same old face? Want a new look from Diamond City's famous Dr. Crocker? Well too bad. Recent events have led to Dr. Sun taking over Facial Reconstruction at the DC Mega Surgery Center. Dr. Crocker, DC's plastic surgeon, was well liked and respected with an unparalleled talent, but also an obsession with beauty. An obsession that lately has been reported to be going a bit far. So far in fact that he has allegedly been performing procedures when physically incapable and is suspected of using Jet and other chems. Earl Sterling, former bartender at the Dugout Inn was reported missing by his employers who hired Nick Valentine, DC's best P.I. to look into Earls disappearance. With the help of an unknown companion, Nick discovered that Earl died at the hands of Dr. Crocker during surgery. At some point, Crocker was confronted and wound up dead. Reports vary and authorities are still looking into the matter, but it's believed that Crocker, unable to live with his actions, died by his own hand. Hands that once brought so much happiness and beauty into this world will now only be remembered for these last deplorable actions.
String.Dest:
医生夺取他人生命. 作者： 艾丽莎·伊莲

厌倦了自己的老脸孔？想从钻石城著名的Crocker博士那里获得一副新面貌？太糟糕了。最近的事件导致Sun医生接管了联邦巨型外科中心的面部重建工作。 Crocker博士，联邦的知名整形外科医生，不但具有无与伦比的天赋，也具有惊人的美感。据报道，最近人们对这一点的看法发生了变化。到目前为止，事实上，他已经被曝光涉嫌在手术中对患者使用杰特和其他毒品。 厄尔·斯特林，独木舟客栈的前酒保，被他的雇主尼克·瓦伦丁报告失踪，联邦的最佳探员正在调查厄尔的失踪事件。 在一个匿名的同伴帮助下，尼克发现厄尔死在Crocker博士的手术中。据信Crocker博士已经死亡，当局仍在调查此事，但认为Crocker博士死于自杀。曾经给联邦带来如此多幸福和美丽的双手，现在只会因这些最后可悲的行动而被人们记住。

String.Source:
The Silver Shroud Lives?! By Alex Chang

When evil walks the streets of Boston, one man lurks in the shadows...shielding the innocent, judging the guilty. That guardian is THE SILVER SHROUD! These words have been spoken at the beginning of every episode of the Silver Shroud radio drama, as it plays on repeat from the old GNR broadcast tower. Now, however, it seems these old stories have come to life. An unknown person has donned the mantle of the Shroud, and begun to wreak havoc upon the ne'er-do-wells of the Commonwealth. Those with evil in their hearts should beware, or death may come for them...brought swiftly by its Shroud!
String.Dest:
银衣怪客复活了?! 作者：亚历克斯·张

当邪恶漫布波士顿街头，一个人潜伏在阴影中……保护无辜者，审判有罪的人。那个守护者就是银衣怪客！ 这是银衣怪客广播剧每一集的开幕词句，无线电波从老GNR广播塔发出。然而，现在这些古老的故事似乎已经成为现实了！。一个不知名的家伙穿上了银衣怪客的披风，并开始在联邦行侠仗义。心中有恶的人应当颤栗了，否则死亡随时可能会降临！

String.Source:
Who is the Mysterious Stranger?! By Alex Chang

Picture the scene... A small group, just trying to make their way between settlements, is beset by hard men with an assortment of weapons, and malicious intent. Blades and bludgeons strike flesh and leather. The bullets scream, DEATH! Just as the battle seems decided for one side or the other, a single shot rings out, fired by a man all could swear had not been present just a moment before. With that one shot, someone dies. The tide turns, but when it is over, the man is gone. Strange as it sounds, this very scene has played out across the wasteland. Reports of the man known only as "The Mysterious Stranger" go back at least two decades. Yet to this day no one knows his motives, nor how he is able to come and go without leaving a trace. Sources now say he has been seen in the Commonwealth. Those with any information are asked to contact Nick Valentine.
String.Dest:
神秘的陌生人是谁？?! 作者： 亚历克斯·张

想象一个场景…一小群人正试图在定居点之间旅行，他们被带着各种武器的恶棍包围。恶棍们露出刀刃和大头棒在空中挥舞威胁。这时！子弹尖叫，死亡！两方刚要决定是否战斗，枪响了，开枪的是个从来不遵守诺言的家伙。接着子弹命中，有人死了。人潮涌动，大家还没转向那个方向，神秘人已经走了。 听起来很奇怪，这一幕在荒原上上演了。这位被称为“神秘陌生人”的人至少可以追溯到20年前。然而直到今天，没有人知道他的动机，也不知道他怎么能不留下痕迹就来了又去。消息人士说，他曾在联邦出现过。 有任何信息的请联系尼克·瓦伦丁。

String.Source:
Current Events By Wren Edwards

An old hermit previously known only for his fabulous beard gained a small measure of notoriety on the caravan circuit last weekend. After a recent score, he seems to have come into large quantities of useful salvage, making him an overnight success. Speculation ranges on where his stores of valuable scrap come from, and no one seems to have the answer. True, a wealthy hermit may only be a B-List celebrity in most parts of the wasteland, but I think there's a lesson to be learned here. There are plenty of things to discover in the Commonwealth. You just have to keep your eyes open and look for them. Who knows what you'll find?
String.Dest:
时事 - 废土隐士 作者： 雷恩·爱德华兹

上个周末，一位老隐士因为他的胡子而出名，他在巡游商队中获得一点恶名。经过最近的一次交易，他被发现似乎得到了大量有用的资源，使他一夜成名。很多人都在猜测他的有价值废料来自何处，但似乎没有人有答案。 真的，一个富有的隐士只能在废土上的大部分地区成为二流名人，但我认为这是一个提示。联邦有很多资源亟待发现。你只要睁大眼睛找它们就行了。谁知道你会找到什么？

String.Source:
The Voice of Diamond City By Mike Burgess

If you've been listening to Diamond City Radio lately, you may have noticed that its host has changed. Make no mistake, the man at the microphone is still Travis Miles, but recent events have lead to him experiencing a tremendous boost in confidence. According to sources in Diamond City, this is likely related to the recent kidnapping and safe return of local business owner Vadim Bobrov. Vadim, known for his unusual accent, tall tales, and production of 'Bobrov's Best Moonshine', had purportedly been accosted in his business by two professional ruffians who claimed he owed them money. Upon refusing to pay, Vadim was forcibly removed from Diamond City to parts unknown. Word spread, and when it reached Travis, he acquired a weapon and left in search of Vadim. Some time later, the two returned, with Travis noticeably changed. Vadim claims Travis single-handedly stormed Beantown Brewery, where he was held, while Travis has given credit to a third party for their assistance. Regardless of the truth, the results speak for themselves -- quite literally.
String.Dest:
钻石城之声 作者：麦克·伯吉斯

如果你最近一直在听钻石城之声广播，你可能已经注意到它的风向已经改变了。 毫无疑问，麦克风里的那个人仍然是特拉维斯·迈尔斯，但最近发生的事件使他信心大增。据来自钻石城的消息，这可能于大企业主瓦迪姆·博布罗夫最近被绑架及安全返回有关。 瓦迪姆，口音很特别，拥有荒诞不经的经历，和生产“博布罗夫最好的月光”的事业。据称被两个专业的暴徒抢劫，声称欠了他们的钱。由于拒不支付，瓦迪姆被从钻石城强行带走。消息迅速传播，当它到了特拉维斯这，他拿起了武器出发去寻找瓦迪姆。 过了一会儿，两人又回来了，特拉维斯明显地变了。瓦迪姆声称，特拉维斯单枪匹马冲进波士顿啤酒馆，他在那里被扣留。事成之后特拉维斯给了神秘的协助者一大笔钱。不管真相到底是什么，结果就在那里。

String.Source:
Regem Inventus Est Mortuus! by Alyssa Elaine

A body was recently discovered in the remains of a building just west of the Corvega Assembly plant. Not just any body though. The New Bugle has received reports that the identity of the victim is none other than the Roach King himself. Years ago, in the Capital wasteland, there was a terrorist referred to as the Roach King due to his inexplicable ability to tame and control radroaches. This individual was reported to have been killed approximately 10 years ago in Washington DC, a.k.a. the Capital Wasteland. It seems, however, that reports of his death are less than accurate. He is believed to have somehow survived and found his way to Boston, where he changed his name to Regi Blattaria. A name that loosely translated from Latin means Regem-King and Blatta-Cockroach. If all of this wasn't weird enough, the remains of the Roach King have disappeared without a trace. Perhaps he is more like the critters he loves than we realized, and like roaches, he can survive almost anything. We may even see him again in another 10 years.
String.Dest:
小强之王被杀! 作者： 艾丽莎·伊莲

身体是最近发现的一个建筑的遗迹就在corvega装配厂西。不仅仅是身体。新的号角已经收到报告说，受害者的身份正是Roach King本人。 许多年前，在首都废土，有一个恐怖分子被称为小强之王，因为他莫名其妙的能力可以驯服和控制小强。这个人被报道已约10年前在华盛顿杀害（首都废土）。然而，他死亡的报道似乎并不准确。他被认为幸存了下来，并来到了波士顿，在那里他将自己的名字改为 雷吉·巴拉特瑞。一个从拉丁语随便翻译过来的名字，意思是宝石之王和巴拉特蟑螂。 如果这一切还不够奇怪的话，蟑螂王的遗骸已经无影无踪了。也许他比我们认为的更像他爱的小动物：蟑螂，他能从几乎任何条件下存活。再过10年，我们可能还会见到他。

String.Source:
Disturbance in the Dugout! by Alyssa Elaine

When you find yourself in Diamond City, there is only one place to get a drink... The Dugout Inn, home of Bobrovs Best. A quaint little watering hole owned by the Bobrov twins, Vadim and Yefim. The Inn is a great place for DC residents to go and unwind at the end of a long day. They even have semi-clean beds with hardly any bed bugs for those that drink too much. It truly is a nice place to grab a quiet drink with friends. Unless the DC Radio DJ, Travis Miles happens to be there that is. Eyewitnesses report that shortly after 6pm, Travis entered the Dugout where he was accosted by two men known as Bull and Gouger. Little is known about the men other than they are sometimes seen around the Beantown Brewery which is usually teeming with Raiders. No one knew why Bull and Gouger were upset with Travis, but one customer would not sit idle. During the altercation, a stranger intervened and encouraged Travis to fight. It was then that a fight broke out with Travis and the stranger against Bull and Gouger. Witnesses claim that it was chaos for a few minutes but suddenly ended with Bull and Gouger fleeing the Dugout Inn.
String.Dest:
酒馆骚乱！ 作者：艾丽莎·伊莲

当你发现自己在钻石城的时候，只有一个地方可以喝酒…独木舟客栈，鲍伯洛夫极品私酒的家。一个古色古香的小水坑的拥有者鲍伯洛夫双胞胎瓦迪姆和耶非姆。这家旅馆是联邦居民在漫长的一天结束后去度假的好去处。他们甚至有半干净几乎没有臭虫的床，为那些喝得太多的人准备的。这真是一个与朋友一起喝杯安静饮料的好地方。除非DC电台DJ，特拉维斯·迈尔斯碰巧在那里。 目击者说，傍晚6点刚过，特拉维斯进入酒馆，他被两个男人：布尔和格鲁格 搭讪。没有人知道他们俩的来历，仅仅有人在波士顿啤酒馆目击他们和匪徒混在一起。没有人知道为什么布尔和格鲁格生特拉维斯的气，但一个陌生人没有闲着。在争执中，一个陌生人介入，鼓励特拉维斯去战斗。那是一场特拉维斯和陌生人 对 布尔和格鲁格 的打斗。目击者声称，几分钟的混乱而突然发生突然结束，布尔和格鲁格逃离独木舟客栈。

String.Source:
Rocket Ships Ahoy!! by Alyssa Elaine

Have you ever seen the pre-war ship USS Constitution on the roof the Weatherby Savings and Loan? Stories about how it got there go from Zetan interference to old man Weatherby parking it there for "tax purposes". Recently, Charlestown was greeted by the sound of war. However this war involved not pipe guns, but cannonballs from the Constitution bombarding the streets of Charlestown. Mrs. Lily Biggs said this; "My poor Jeff. A cannonball came in the window and hit him in the face. Took his head off all neat and clean". Upon viewing Mr. Biggs body this reporter agrees it was indeed "neat and clean". Removal was so perfect one would swear it wasn't from a cannonball, but a machete. Yet Mrs. Biggs is firm in her assertion that it was cannon fire. Sadly, Mr. Biggs wasn't the only casualty. Afterward, bodies of a gang of Scavengers and the robot "crew" of the ship filled the streets. It was reported that NX-42 rockets on the hull blew up when the robots ignited them in an attempt to fly the ship! Then the Scavengers and the mechanical crew went to war. A survivor was reported leaving the scene and is being sought for questioning.
String.Dest:
火箭宪法号!! 作者：艾丽莎·伊莲

你见过韦瑟比银行屋顶上的战前战舰 宪法号 嘛？那个关于宪法号是怎么在泽坦星人的干涉下跑到老旧的银行顶端的，据称是为了"税收原因"。近日，查尔斯敦受到战争的影响。然而这场战争涉及的不是自制的铁管手枪，而是炮弹！炮弹从宪法号上直接轰击查尔斯敦的街道。 莉莉·比格斯太太说：“我可怜的杰夫。一发炮弹从窗户外飞来打在他的脸上。把他的头都清理干净了。看到比格斯先生的身体，记者同意它确实“干净整洁”。去除如此完美让人会发誓这不是一发炮弹而是弯刀的杰作。然而，比格斯太太坚决认为那是炮弹。可悲的是，比格斯先生并不是唯一的受害者。后来，一伙拾荒者和机器人“船员”的尸体挤满了街道。据报道，当机器人企图发动宪法号的时候不慎点燃了NX-42火箭！然后拾荒者和机械船员就打成了一团了。据报道，一名幸存者逃离了现场，该幸存者正在被通缉。

String.Source:
Commonwealth Abuzz Amid Strange Lights in the Sky By A.J. Cleary

Rumors abound, but nobody seems to know the source of the strange lights seen over the Commonwealth recently. While many claim to have seen the event, nobody can seem to agree what, precisely, it was. Accompanied by a loud whoosh and capped with an explosive bang, the event has led some to speculate that the Great War has returned to Boston. "I read about it," said one elderly citizen, "Massive bombs. It's the reds, I tell you!" Others were not so sure. One concerned citizen claimed the Brotherhood of Steel was using the Commonwealth as a test range for their newest weapons, while others still blamed the Institute. Several groups have been spotted combing the Commonwealth for whatever wreckage can be found, but no definitive site has been discovered.
String.Dest:
奇异的光亮照耀联邦 By A.J. Cleary

谣言满天飞，但似乎没有人真正知道最近联邦上空奇怪的光线的来源。虽然许多人声称已经看到了这一事件，但似乎没有人能确切地说，它是什么。 伴随着一声响亮的嘶嘶声，巨大的爆炸让很多人怀疑，似乎伟大战争已经重返波士顿。 “我在报纸上读到过！”一位年长的市民说，“这是核弹！当年就是大大的红色标题，我告诉你！” 其他人则不那么肯定。一位担心的公民声称钢铁兄弟会正在利用联邦作为他们最新武器的试验场，而另一些人仍然指责学院。 有几组人被派去在联邦寻找残骸，但是截至目前没有发现任何确切的证据。

String.Source:
Rocket Ships Ahoy!! by Alyssa Elaine

Have you ever seen the pre-war ship USS Constitution on the roof the Weatherby Savings and Loan? Stories about how it got there go from Zetan interference to old man Weatherby parking it there for "tax purposes". Recently, Charlestown was greeted by the sound of war. However this battle involved not pipe guns, but cannonballs from the Constitution bombarding the streets of Charlestown. Mrs. Lily Biggs had this to say; "My poor Jeff. A cannonball came in the window and hit him in the face. Took his head off all neat and clean". Upon viewing Mr. Biggs body this reporter agrees that it was indeed "neat and clean". Decapitation was so perfect one would swear his head was removed not from a cannonball, but a machete. Yet Mrs. Biggs is firm in her assertion that it was cannon fire. Sadly, Mr. Biggs wasn't the only casualty. Afterward, bodies of Scavengers, a local gang, filled the streets. The Constitution was nowhere to be seen. The battle may have been heard in Charlestown, but all of Boston saw the NX-42 rockets on the ship's hull ignite and take flight where it came to rest atop the Weatherby Investment Trust to the south.
String.Dest:
火箭宪法号!! 作者：艾丽莎·伊莲

你见过韦瑟比银行屋顶上的战前战舰 宪法号 嘛？那个关于宪法号是怎么在泽坦星人的干涉下跑到老旧的银行顶端的，据称是为了"税收原因"。近日，查尔斯敦受到战争的影响。然而这场战争涉及的不是自制的铁管手枪，而是炮弹！炮弹从宪法号上直接轰击查尔斯敦的街道。 莉莉·比格斯太太说：“我可怜的杰夫。一发炮弹从窗户外飞来打在他的脸上。把他的头都清理干净了。看到比格斯先生的身体，记者同意它确实“干净整洁”。去除如此完美让人会发誓这不是一发炮弹而是弯刀的杰作。然而，比格斯太太坚决认为那是炮弹。可悲的是，比格斯先生并不是唯一的受害者。后来，一伙拾荒者和机器人“船员”的尸体挤满了街道。据报道，当机器人企图发动宪法号的时候不慎点燃了NX-42火箭！然后拾荒者和机械船员就打成了一团了。据报道，一名幸存者逃离了现场，该幸存者正在被通缉。

String.Source:
Graygarden Seeks Brave Adventurer By Skye Summers

Graygarden, the greenhouse operated solely by robots, has been having trouble with their water. Resources indicate that the water supply Graygarden depends on has declined significantly and the robots have grown concerned. The greenhouse draws its water from Weston Water Treatment plant and it has been confirmed that the robot known as Supervisor White is seeking a brave soul who can solve the problem. However, it may not be so simple. Resources have also confirmed that the exterior of the water plant has been overrun with hostile mutants. Getting past them would be difficult enough, but who knows what awaits inside the plant itself.
String.Dest:
格林花园正在寻找勇敢的冒险者 作者： 斯凯·夏天

格林花园，一个完全由机器人操作的温室，一直有水的麻烦。资源表明，格林花园的供水显着下降，机器人已经关注此事。温室将水从韦斯顿水处理厂引入，已证实的机器人主管怀特正在寻求一个勇敢的冒险者来解决这个问题。 然而，事情可能并非如此简单。消息还证实，自来水厂的外部已经充满了敌对的变种人。要克服这些困难是需要花费很大力气的，但是谁知道水厂内部究竟在发生了什么呢？。

String.Source:
Who Are the Minutemen? A New Bugle Special Report By Wren Edwards

The Minutemen are back after taking tragic losses, and once again looking to help the people of the Commonwealth. With new leadership and members joining from settlements far and wide, everyone should know about the Minutemen, but what about the people who make up the Minutemen? This week, I set out to put a face to the organization. Regrettably, the new General of the Minutemen was unavailable for comment, but a spokesman, long-time Minuteman Preston Garvey, was able to offer me a moment of his time for an interview. W: "What exactly do the Minutemen stand for?" P: "Protect the people at a moment's notice, that's always been our motto. We're just a bunch of folks who believe in fighting for something bigger than ourselves." W: "Well, you've certainly been active lately! Why the surge of activity?" P: "There's always another settlement that needs our help." W: "Lastly, what about the Minutemen donation drive? I heard that you've been heading it up personally." P: "I don't know who told you that, but their information is dead wrong. The Minutemen don't go around pressuring anyone to give them anything. We're out there to help people, not some raider gang." So, there you have it. A big thanks from myself and the New Bugle to Preston Garvey for taking the time to speak to us. Hopefully, dear readers, this will help you to understand the men and women risking their lives to protect us just a little better.
String.Dest:
谁是Minutemen? 新号角报特别报道 作者： 雷恩·爱德华兹

在遭受以悲剧性的失败后，Minutemen再次出现在联邦，帮助那些需要帮助的人。新的领导班子和从各个聚落广泛加入的成员，每个人都知道什么是Minutemen，但对于创立了Minutemen的人来说呢？ 这一周，我开始对这个组织进行采访。令人遗憾的是，无法采访到Minutemen组织的新将军。但一位发言人，久经考验的Minuteman战士普雷斯顿·加维，能给我片刻的时间采访。 雷恩：“Minutemen到底代表着什么？” 普雷斯顿：“时刻准备着！为保护人民而奉献！这是我们的座右铭。我们只是一群为人民服务的普通人。” 雷恩：“嗯，你最近的确很活跃！为什么最近活动如此频繁？” 普雷斯顿:“总会有另一个聚落需要我们的帮助。” 雷恩：“最后，促使你们行动的动力是什么呢？我听说你只是单纯出于个人原因？” 普雷斯顿：“我不知道是谁告诉你的，但是他们完全搞错了。Minutemen不会要求群众納粮，而是帮助群众，我们从群众中来，到群众中去，才不是什么匪帮分子。” 所以，这就是全部的采访内容了。新号角报和我感谢普雷斯顿·加维抽出时间来接受采访。希望亲爱的读者们，这将有助于你们了解那些冒着生命危险来保护我们的男人和女人。

Your settlers are currently stockpiling resources to make a more advanced product.
You can borrow some of their stockpiles, but it will take longer for them to upgrade if you decide not to return what you took.
Alternatively, you can provide them with more of these resources to allow them to upgrade sooner!

你可以借用他们的一些储备，但如果你决定不归还你所带的东西，他们将需要更长的时间来升级。

String.Source: City Manager 2078: Self-Destruct sequence is currently running, please wait for it to complete before starting another run.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：自毁序列目前正在运行，请等待它完成之后再开始另一个运行。

String.Source:
Advanced Industrial plots will start out by mining a resource.
After enough time has passed, and the settler has amassed a sufficient stockpile of those resources, they will upgrade to a processing facility to convert those resources into something a little more advanced.
They'll do the same thing with this more advanced resource and then upgrade into a production facility that creates a product from those resources.
String.Dest:
高级工业地块将从开采资源开始。
经过足够的时间，定居者已经积累了足够的资源储备，他们将升级到一个试制车间，将这些资源转化为更先进的资源。
他们会用这种更先进的资源做同样的事情，然后升级到一个生产工厂，从这些资源中创建产品。

String.Source:
It's time to (re)start the Industrial Revolution! Your settlers are ready to begin salvaging old machinery and put it to work.
Advanced Industrial plots function a little differently than other types, would you like to learn more?
String.Dest:
该是（重新）发动工业革命的时候了！你们的定居者准备开始修理旧机器并把它投入工作。
高级工业区的功能与其他类型有点不同，你想了解更多吗？

String.Source:
Here's where things get different.
Advanced Industrial buildings can branch into different processing and production facilities depending on what other Industrial is available in your settlement!
If you'd like to have fine-tune control over how and when your Advanced Industrial buildings evolve, change the Upgrade Advanced setting to Manual in your holotape.
String.Dest:
这就是事情不同的地方。
先进的工业建筑可分为不同的加工和生产设施，这取决于其他工业在你的城市的建设情况！
如果你想精确控制你的高级工业建筑发展，在pipboy里播放城市管家全像卡带，以更改高级设置为手动升级你的高级工业。

String.Source:
Advanced Industrial are not without a cost.
These advanced technologies are loud, require extra power and water, and often create dangerous living situations, sometimes making your Citizens unhappy. On top of that, your new technological achievements will make your city a target, so you'll need to prepare with extra defenses.
String.Dest:
先进的工业也不是没有成本的。
这些先进的技术是吵闹的，需要额外的电力和水，往往造成危险的生活状况，有时使你的公民不高兴。最重要的是，你的新技术成就将使你的城市成为一个被匪徒盯上的目标，所以你需要准备额外的防御。

String.Source:
Don't worry though, you'll get it figured out.
The key to a healthy city is a proper balance, so keep those Citizen's happy and they'll keep the resources flowing!
String.Dest:
不过别担心，你会弄明白的。
健康城市的关键是要有一个适当的平衡，让那些快乐的人保持他们的资源流动！

String.Source:
Sim Settlements needs to update its data storage. This could take a few minutes.
Please don't interact with or build any new Plots until you get a pop-up message like this one that this process is complete.
You can continue to play the rest of the game while you wait!
String.Dest:
Sim Settlements 需要更新其数据存储文件。这可能需要几分钟。
请不要与任何Sim Settlements地块互动或建立任何新的地块，直到你收到完成更新的弹出消息。
在等待时你可以继续玩游戏的非 Sim Settlements部分！

Find more water in containers.
String.Dest:
你收集的一个问题！
在容器中找到更多的水。

String.Source:
Once you're satisfied with the building plan you have chosen, exit the container and it will start.
If you selected Build This and decided to change your mind - select a different plan and choose Cancel to ensure a new plan isn't selected.
String.Dest:
一旦你满意你所选择的建筑计划，退出菜单，它就开始工作了。
如果您选择了“建造”并决定改变主意，请选择一个不同的计划，并选择取消以确保没有选择新计划。

String.Source:
Microfusion Garage by kinggath from Industrial Revolution
Researches microfusion for your city.
Benefits Generates Microfusion Cells and Fusion Cores.
Costs -20 Power -15 Happiness (Dangerous)
String.Dest:
微型聚变车间 by kinggath 来自工业革命DLC
研究微型聚变电池。
效益 产生聚变电池和融合核心。
成本 -20 电力 -15 幸福（危险）

String.Source:
Fuel Depot by kinggath from Industrial Revolution

提高你城市的生产水平。
